meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7520.

td.p: Kevin McCarthy, a postal clerk from Lincoln, Rhode Island
Rachel Snyder, a writer from Grand Rapids, Michigan
Alan Lin, a software engineer from Santa Barbara, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $84,400)

tr.td: CELEBRITY FRAGRANCES
LIT-POURRI
THE WIDE WORLD OF SPOTS
WHAT COLOR IS YOUR BUSINESS?
FIRST & "TEN"
WE'RE GOING LONG

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Alan
Rachel
Kevin
LITTLE MYTH SUNSHINE
ANNUAL EVENTS
I AM A CATEGORY
CLUES ACROSS OHIO
(Alex: And the clues will be read by on-air talent from our affiliated stations in that state.)
THE SPANISH-AMERICAN WAR
IN COMMUNICADO
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that can be formed from the letters in the word "communicado.")
